document.full_text: zynga inc may file for a multibillion-dollar ipo as early as this week, tech blog allthingsdigital reported, as the maker of the farmville and mafia wars games for facebook heads toward a long-awaited market debut.
document.title: social phenom zynga on cusp of mega ipo: report
lines_and_colors: zynga inc may file for a multibillion-dollar ipo as early as this week, tech blog allthingsdigital reported, as the maker of the farmville and mafia wars games for facebook heads toward a long-awaited market debut.
